plot outline: Amitabha "Amitabha" and Rupsha "Monami" Chakraborty's hunt for a suitable house leads them to a bungalow which seems ideal for their needs. Even after learning that the previous tenant "Tanusri" had committed suicide, the couple start living there. Trouble starts immediately. The maid and the guard invade Rupsha's space with sinister, knowing smiles during the day, and at night she is kept awake by the sound of mournful lullabies emerging from behind closed doors. Windows crack, utensils crash, dolls start to speak and things come to a head when the guard is violently murdered.
title: Bhoy
plot: Amitabha "Amitabha" and Rupsha "Monami" Chakraborty's hunt for a suitable house leads them to a bungalow which seems ideal for their needs. Even after learning that the previous tenant "Tanusri" had committed suicide, the couple start living there. Trouble starts immediately. The maid and the guard invade Rupsha's space with sinister, knowing smiles during the day, and at night she is kept awake by the sound of mournful lullabies emerging from behind closed doors. Windows crack, utensils crash, dolls start to speak and things come to a head when the guard is violently murdered.::Ashwani Shukla (publicist)
